headline: Tyler Technologies (NYSE:TYL) Expands Government Solutions With St. Petersburg Collaboration
summary: Tyler Technologies (NYSE:TYL) recently signed a significant agreement with the City of St. Petersburg, Florida, to provide multiple technological solutions aimed at enhancing governmental functions. This development aligns with Tyler's focus on expanding its public sector offerings and may have influenced its share price increase by 3% over the past month. During this period, the company announced robust financial results, with notable revenue and net income growth in the fourth quarter,...
